Default.Title: Default
Default.Content: When no option is being selected, it will search all the words that rhyming with the keyword. (both the vowel and the final sound).

IgnoreFinalSound.Title: Ignore Final Sound
IgnoreFinalSound.Content: When selected, it will search all the words that rhyming with the keyword, ignoring the final sound (coda).

SameTone.Title: Same Tone
SameTone.Content: When selected, it will filter the words that have different tone. Take "ah ūn" and "phah phún" as an example, it will no longer consider as rhymed word because they have different tone.

NasalSound.Title: Nasal Sound
NasalSound.Content: When selected, it will search all the words that rhyming with the keyword, ignoring they are nasal or not. Take "soaⁿ" and "soa" as an example, it will be consider as a rhyming pair of words.

SameArticulationPart.Title: Same Part of Articulation
SameArticulationPart.Content: When selected, it will search all the words that rhyming with the keyword, as long as they have the same part of articulation. Take "sin" and "si̍t" as an example, it will be consider as a rhyming pair of words.

SimilarVowel.Title: Similar Vowel
SimilarVowel.Content: When selected, it will search all the words with similar vowel(s).
